languages.text: {n}Судя по смешкам среди дворян, ваши слова попали в цель. Зауэрбэк униженно краснеет.{/n} "Ни в коем... случае, Ваша Светлость. Я довольствуюсь ролью слуги".

traits.locale_text: {n}Судя по смешкам среди дворян, ваши слова попали в цель. Зауэрбек униженно краснеет.{/n} "Ни в коем... случае, Ваша милость. Я довольствуюсь ролью слуги".

languages.text: {n}Judging by the chuckles among the nobles, your words have found their mark. Macharius blushes in humiliation.{/n} "Not in the... slightest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am content with my role as servant."
languages.original_text: {n}Судя по смешкам среди дворян, ваши слова попали в цель. Зауэрбэк униженно краснеет.{/n} "Ни в коем... случае, Ваша Светлость. Я довольствуюсь ролью слуги".

traits.locale_text: {n}Judging by the chuckles among the nobles, your words have hit the bullseye. Macharius blushes in humiliation.{/n} "Not in the... slightest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am content with the role of a servant."

{n}Judging by the chuckles among the nobles, your words have hit the bullseye. Macharius blushes in humiliation.{/n} "Not in the... slightest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am content with the role of a servant."

{n}Judging by the chuckles among the nobles, your words have found their mark. Macharius blushes in humiliation.{/n} "Not in the... slightest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am content with my role as servant."

{n}Judging by the chuckles among the nobles, your words have found their mark. Macharius blushes in humiliation.{/n} "Not in the... slightest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am content with my role as servant."

{n}Judging by the chuckles among the nobles, your words have found their mark. Macharius blushes in humiliation.{/n} "Not in the... slightest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am content with my role as servant."

languages.text: {n}貴族たちの含み笑いから察するに、あなたの言葉は図星だったようだ。侮辱されたマハリウスは真っ赤になる。{/n}「そのようなことは…微塵もございません、陛下。臣下という役割に満足しております」
languages.original_text: {n}Judging by the chuckles among the nobles, your words have found their mark. Macharius blushes in humiliation.{/n} "Not in the... slightest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am content with my role as servant."

traits.locale_text: {n}貴族たちの含み笑いから察するに、あなたの言葉は図星だったようだ。侮辱されたマハリウスは真っ赤になる。{/n}「そのようなことは…微塵もございません、陛下。臣下という役割に満足しております」

languages.text: {n}从身边贵族的笑声来看，你的话正中了马卡里乌斯的痛处。马卡里乌斯恼怒地涨红了脸。{/n}“没有……一点都没有，大人。我很满意我的仆人身份。”
languages.original_text: {n}Judging by the chuckles among the nobles, your words have found their mark. Macharius blushes in humiliation.{/n} "Not in the... slightest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am content with my role as servant."

traits.locale_text: {n}从身边贵族的笑声来看，你的话正中了马卡里乌斯的痛处。马卡里乌斯恼怒地涨红了脸。{/n}“没有……一点都没有，大人。我很满意我的仆人身份。”

languages.text: {n}A juzgar por las risitas entre los nobles, tus palabras han dado en el blanco. Macharius se sonroja humillado.{/n} «En... absoluto, {mf|milord|milady}. Yo me conformo con {mf|servirle|servirla}».
languages.original_text: {n}Judging by the chuckles among the nobles, your words have found their mark. Macharius blushes in humiliation.{/n} "Not in the... slightest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am content with my role as servant."

traits.locale_text: {n}A juzgar por las risitas entre los nobles, tus palabras han dado en el blanco. Macharius se sonroja humillado.{/n} «En... absoluto, {mf|milord|milady}. Yo me conformo con {mf|servirle|servirla}».

languages.text: {n}Vos paroles ont fait mouche, comme en attestent les petits rires qui se font entendre parmi les nobles. Humilié, Macharius s'empourpre.{/n} « Pas le moins du monde, Votre Seigneurie... Je suis parfaitement satisfait de mon rôle de serviteur. »
languages.original_text: {n}Judging by the chuckles among the nobles, your words have found their mark. Macharius blushes in humiliation.{/n} "Not in the... slightest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am content with my role as servant."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vos paroles ont fait mouche, comme en attestent les petits rires qui se font entendre parmi les nobles. Humilié, Macharius s'empourpre.{/n} « Pas le moins du monde, Votre Seigneurie... Je suis parfaitement satisfait de mon rôle de serviteur. »

languages.text: {n}Dem Kichern unter den Adligen nach zu urteilen, haben deine Worte ins Schwarze getroffen. Macharius errötet gedemütigt.{/n} "Nicht im ... Geringsten, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich bin zufrieden mit meiner Aufgabe als Diener."
languages.original_text: {n}Judging by the chuckles among the nobles, your words have found their mark. Macharius blushes in humiliation.{/n} "Not in the... slightest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am content with my role as servant."

traits.locale_text: {n}Dem Kichern unter den Adligen nach zu urteilen, haben deine Worte ins Schwarze getroffen. Macharius errötet gedemütigt.{/n} "Nicht im ... Geringsten, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich bin zufrieden mit meiner Aufgabe als Diener."

languages.text: {n}Soyluların kendi aralarında pis pis gülüşmesine bakılırsa söylediklerinde tamamen haklısın. Macharius'un yüzü utançtan kızarıyor.{/n} "Öyle bir şey olabilir mi {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri? Hizmetkârınız olarak görevimden memnunum."
languages.original_text: {n}Judging by the chuckles among the nobles, your words have found their mark. Macharius blushes in humiliation.{/n} "Not in the... slightest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am content with my role as servant."

traits.locale_text: {n}Soyluların kendi aralarında pis pis gülüşmesine bakılırsa söylediklerinde tamamen haklıymışsın. Utançtan Macharius'un yüzü kızarıyor.{/n} "Öyle bir şey olabilir mi {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri? Hizmetkârınız olarak görevimden memnunum."
